triples.name: Unmanned aerial vehicle
triples.relevance: The paper comprehensively reviews unmanned aircraft systems (drones) which are the core subject matter of the survey.

triples.name: Urban air mobility
triples.relevance: UAM is a key emerging concept explored in the paper as an innovative urban transportation paradigm leveraging drone technologies.

triples.name: Aviation regulations
triples.relevance: The paper discusses updated aviation regulations necessary for safe UAS integration into urban environments.

triples.name: Airspace
triples.relevance: Airspace classifications are explicitly covered as a key regulatory aspect relevant to UAS and UAM operations.
